text: "Blind Before I Stop" is a single by Meat Loaf released in 1987. It is from the album Blind Before I Stop. It is one of the few songs he has made where he plays rhythm guitar. ==Personnel== *Meat Loaf — lead vocals, guitar *Mats Björklynd — keys, programming, drums *Peter Weihe — guitars *Dieter Petereit — bass *John Golden — bass *Pit Löw — keyboards and programming *Curt Cress — drums *Amy Goff — backing vocals *Peter Bischof — vocals *Bert Gebhard — vocals *Bimey Oberreit — vocals *Elaine Goff — vocals == Charts == {| class="wikitable" |- !
